description.english: Hit 100 Note Streak during any song
description.german: Schaff in einem beliebigen Song eine 100-Noten-Kette
description.french: Atteignez une série de 100 notes lors d'une chanson
description.italian: Esegui una serie di 100 note in una canzone.
description.spanish: Consigue una racha de 100 notas en cualquier canción.
description.schinese: 用任意歌曲连击100个音符
description.japanese: どれか一つの曲で100回連続で音符をヒットする

description.english: Press the Hold Note for "1 000" seconds
description.german: Drücke „1.000“ Sekunden lang die Lange Note
description.french: Appuyez sur la note maintenue pendant 1000 secondes au total
description.italian: Tieni premuta la nota continua per “1.000” secondi in totale.
description.spanish: Mantén notas durante 1000 segundos.
description.schinese: 按下长音符共“1000”秒
description.japanese: 持続音符を合計「1,000」秒長押しする

description.english: Finish Tutorial
description.german: Schließe das Tutorial ab
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Finalizar tutorial
description.schinese: 完成教程
description.japanese: チュートリアルを完了する

displayName.english: And That's How The Story Goes
displayName.french: Et voilà ce qu’il en est

description.english: Complete STORY MODE
description.german: Schließe den STORY-MODUS ab
description.french: Terminez le MODE HISTOIRE
description.italian: Completa la modalità storia.
description.spanish: Completa el MODO HISTORIA
description.schinese: 完成故事模式
description.japanese: ストーリーモードをクリアする

description.english: Hit 500 Note Streak during any song
description.german: Schaff in einem beliebigen Song eine 500-Noten-Kette
description.french: Atteignez une série de 500 notes lors d'une chanson
description.italian: Esegui una serie di 500 note in una canzone.
description.spanish: Consigue una racha de 500 notas en cualquier canción.
description.schinese: 用任意歌曲连击500个音符
description.japanese: どれか一つの曲で500回連続で音符をヒットする

description.english: Play "10 000" Single Notes in total
description.german: Spiele insgesamt „10.000“ Einzelnoten
description.french: Jouez 10000 notes individuelles en tout
description.italian: Suona “10.000” note singole in totale.
description.spanish: Toca 10000 notas individuales en total.
description.schinese: 总共演奏“10000”个单音符
description.japanese: 合計「10,000」回音符をヒットする

description.english: Mash "5 000" times in total
description.german: Klopfe insgesamt „5.000“-mal
description.french: Effectuez une note répétée 5000 fois en tout
description.italian: Suona “5.000” note ripetute in totale.
description.spanish: Aporrea 5000 veces en total.
description.schinese: 总共速奏“5000”次
description.japanese: 合計「5,000」回マッシュする

description.english: Gain "10 000" points from Whammy
description.german: Verdiene insgesamt „10.000“ Punkte mit Whammy
description.french: Gagnez un total de 10000 points en faisant du vibrato
description.italian: Ottieni “10.000” punti in totale eseguendo whammy.
description.spanish: Gana 10000 puntos en total usando el pedal.
description.schinese: 用摇把颤音总共获得“10000”分
description.japanese: ワーミー中に合計「10,000」ポイントを得る

displayName.french: C'est en forgeant que l'on devient forgeron

description.english: Finish any song on any difficulty with S+ grade

description.schinese: 在任意难度以S+评级完成任意歌曲
